scripts.compile: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/src emscripten/emsdk:latest emcc -Os -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_decode_avif"]' -I /dav1d/include -L /dav1d/lib -l/dav1d -o decode_avif.cpp -o decode_avif.js
scripts.compile-win: docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/src emscripten/emsdk:latest emcc -Os -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_decode_avif"]' -I /dav1d/include -L /dav1d/lib -l /dav1d -o decode_avif.cpp -o decode_avif.js
